column4: Please, anyone? I have no access to official Ubuntu repositories or the official websites. Is anyone else experiencing these issues? I can access all other websites without any problems
which repos?
all of the default ones
Well, 'default' varies depending on your location
i can access google's and other third party repos but none of the ones provided with the distro, these include:
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ feisty-security main restricted
deb-src http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ feisty-security main restricted
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ feisty-security universe
deb-src http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ feisty-security universe
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ feisty-security multiverse
deb-src http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ feisty-security multiverse
deb http://dl.google.com/linux/deb/ stable non-free
You don't need to paste.  Simply 'archive.ubuntu.com' wouldve sufficed
oops, minus that last google one
sorry, i am inexperienced
any advice?
you might try switching to a different mirror, us.archive.ubuntu.com, see if that helps
ok, i will try that, thank you
no luck with those mirrors. Still says I cannot resolve. It appears it is a DNS issue from the error messages but I can resolve most any other site.
so i take it no one else is experiencing my same issues then
How about the IP itself?  Uh, ubuntu.com is... 82.211.81.158
I can successfully ping the IP you provided
